e.  The severity of SVAS varies considerably, even among family members. Some affected individuals die in infancy, while others never experience symptoms of the disorder.",GHR,supravalvular aortic stenosis
How many people are affected by supravalvular aortic stenosis ?,"SVAS occurs in 1 in 20,000 newborns worldwide.",GHR,supravalvular aortic stenosis
